channel.title: ScanX – IPO News
channel.description: Auto-generated feed for ScanX IPO News

item.title: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price
item.description: Top News Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price 1 day ago Vidya Wires Limited debuted on BSE at ₹52.13 per share, trading above its IPO issue price of ₹52.00. The listing reflects a modest premium of ₹0.13, representing approximately 0.25% gains over the offer price. The successful market debut enables regular trading of the company's shares on the exchange.

item.title: Raymond Realty Limited Conducts Investor Conference Meeting on December 11, 2025
item.description: Raymond Realty Limited Conducts Investor Conference Meeting on December 11, 2025 32 minutes ago Raymond Realty Limited held an investor conference meeting on December 11, 2025, presenting its comprehensive portfolio including 100 acres in Thane and six JDA projects with ₹40,000 crores total revenue potential. The company showcased strong financial performance with booking value growing at 36% CAGR over four years and recent launches including premium residential projects in Thane and BKC. The presentation outlined the company's asset-light JDA-led expansion strategy targeting 20% growth in booking value.

item.title: Nifty and Sensex Close in Green: Market Wrap for December 11, 2025
item.description: Nifty and Sensex Close in Green: Market Wrap for December 11, 2025 5 hours ago Indian stock markets ended positively on December 11, with Nifty 50 up 0.55% at 25,898.55 and Sensex rising 0.51% to 84,818.13. Market breadth was bullish with 2,597 advancing stocks out of 4,548 traded. Key buzzing stocks included InterGlobe Aviation, Biocon Biologics, and Kaynes Technology, driven by company-specific news and analyst actions.

item.title: Shreyas Shibulal Sells 19.93 Lakh Infosys Shares Worth ₹317.91 Crores in Open Market
item.description: Shreyas Shibulal Sells 19.93 Lakh Infosys Shares Worth ₹317.91 Crores in Open Market 40 minutes ago Infosys promoter Shreyas Shibulal sold 19,92,860 equity shares worth ₹317.91 crores through open market transactions on December 10-11, 2025, at prices ranging from ₹1,587.25 to ₹1,592.73 per share. The sale reduced his shareholding from 0.49% to 0.44% of the company's total equity. The transaction was conducted through Cholamandalam Securities and disclosed under SEBI regulations, with formal notifications submitted to stock exchanges and company management.
